description:
Useful for cleaning, transporting and maintaining your bike. With simple 1-handed operation, the Chain Keeper sits where your cassette’s smallest cog would be, and lets you maintain chain tension to remove the rear wheel.

  • 1-hand operation takes greasy frustration out of the equation
  • Includes adapters to use with quick-release and 12mm thru-axle dropouts
  • CNC aluminium construction
  • Delrin roller protects your chain
  • Dimensions: 15 x 10cm
name: Feedback Sports Chain Keeper
